title: Google Play System Update stuck on Jan 1 2021
content:
This problem started when I rolled back to Android 11 from the 12 beta. When I manually check update it says I'm on the latest version. Tried clearing google play store cache & data but, not fixed.
This is a problem every one who opt out of Android 12 beta is facing and there's no way to fix it. So please help me out with the issue.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
